nodes.text: Dalyrakes were large arachnoid species from Talus.

Dalyrakes were multi-limbed arachnoids native to Talus, but also prevalent on Corellia. They lived both on land and in water, using two of their stalk-tentacles as lures for food animals, stabbing them with a poison barb when they approached. They primarily ate fish, small reptavians, and tabage. If cut, their hides secreted black toxin. When they died, they instinctively lunged as a form of death-spasm.
Their meat was considered a delicacy.
A subspecies larger than the common dalyrakes was the giant dalyrake.
Dalyrakes appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
